name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 5, the public account "Ye Ping" published an article titled "Strongly Condemned: Lao Dongyan - Anti-traitor Behavior in the Name of Public Intellectuals".
The article denounced Tsinghua University law professor Lao Dongyan as "a weak public intellectual who has brought shame to Tsinghua University" and "confusing right and wrong and calling a black cat a white cat".
It also said that her remarks "attacking" the online ID and online account were "blinded by greed" and "essentially an anti-traitor" who was "selling out her country for glory" in order to obtain a Canadian green card.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A blogger summarized the recent drug testing incident of Chinese swimmers and questioned Russia's infiltration of public opinion in China. 
He said that the reason why the Chinese swimming team had 2-3 more inspections than other national teams was because of the previous 23-person contamination incident of the Chinese swimming team, which led to other athletes' distrust of Chinese swimmers. Therefore, WADA's additional testing of the Chinese swimming team is actually to help Chinese athletes prove their innocence to everyone.
The focus of the whole thing is that the United States questioned WADA's shielding of China, but some public opinions on the Chinese Internet have obvious traces of "helping Russia" rather than "helping China". Many contents come from Russian media and Russian self-made false contents, pointing the finger at WADA and accusing WADA of attacking Chinese sports.
He said that Russians do hate WADA, but the relationship between China, Russia and WADA is two different things. WADA's executive vice president is actually Chinese, which is also the reason why the United States questioned...
fullContent:
一位博主对近期中国游泳运动员药检事件做了总结，质疑俄罗斯对中国的舆论渗透。 
他表示，中国游泳队比其他国家队伍多出2-3次检查的原因是因为此前中国游泳队的23人污染事件，导致其他运动员对中国游泳运动员的不信任。因此WADA对中国游泳队的额外检测实际上是帮助中国运动员向所有人证明清白。
整个事情的焦点是美国质疑WADA包庇中国，但是中文网络上的一些舆论有明显的“帮俄国”而不是“帮中国”的痕迹，很多内容来自俄媒和俄罗斯自制的虚假内容，把矛头指向WADA，指责说WADA为了打击中国体育。
他表示，俄国人确实恨 WADA，但中俄和WADA的关系是两回事。WADA的常务副主席其实是中国人，这也是美国质疑WADA偏袒中国的地方。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 4, Zhao Lijian's wife "Da Cong and Chou Ya Tou" posted a photo with Zhao, and wrote "Escaped from death", saying that Zhao Lijian is the best husband and the best Communist Party member. This Weibo post triggered speculation among netizens.
Then on the 5th, "Da Cong and Chou Ya Tou" posted again, revealing that she had stage 5 breast cancer, but for the sake of the country and the company, she went to Pakistan during the operation to complete the signing with the Prime Minister.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some Bangladeshis have taken it upon themselves to guard the gates of Hindu temples and communities to prevent them from being vandalized by radical Muslims.
At the same time, all sectors of Bangladesh are calling for an end to hate crimes against religious minorities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 6, Tangshan City stated that the issues raised by Chen Zhiwei, the police officer who responded to the Tangshan barbecue restaurant beating case, in his real-name report were all untrue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, some people in the system are asked to forward this article.
Since 2019, the Chinese government has been mobilizing civil servants to forward this type of official account disguised as a personal account.
Currently, there is no information about which official media "Ye Ping" is under the skin, but people in the system are often asked to forward articles from this public account, including the previous "Secret History of Tsai Ing-wen" which came from this public account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bangladeshi people used excavators to demolish the statue of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the "Father of the Nation" of Bangladesh. People cheered and rushed to trample on the head of the statue. Sheikh Mujibur Rahman was also the father of former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 5, Chen Zhiwei, the police officer who was seriously derelict in his duty in the "Tangshan Beating Incident", reported the case officers in Caofeidian District, Tangshan City, using his ID card and his real name, saying that he was "taken the blame" as a grassroots police officer in the case and was wrongfully imprisoned. The truth behind it was different from what netizens saw. On August 5, Tangshan reported the investigation: the problems it reported were not true.
On August 6, Chen Zhiwei spoke again, saying that the on-duty leader was leading the relevant police officers to leave their posts and drink outside at the time of the incident, which made it impossible to dispatch the police immediately. After several rounds of communication, he was notified to dispatch the police. Chen Zhiwei also published a work group chat record to confirm (as of the time of posting, the chat record has been deleted)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chen Zhiwei said that last night someone from Tangshan came to his residence in another province and knocked on the door several times, trying to persuade him to go back to Tangshan to deal with the matter, but he did not open the door for safety reasons. Chen Zhiwei said that he had read the official notice and "the relevant department that dealt with me at the beginning not only acted as a referee, but also started to pass the buck." He also revealed that more information will be sorted out and released in succession.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Sorting out:
According to official reports and official media reports;
At 2:40, Chen Zhizhi and others harassed and beat the woman Wang and her companions in the restaurant
At 2:41, the masses called the police
At 2:55, the four victims were sent to the hospital by 120
At 3:09, the civilian police arrived at the scene (the map shows: the Airport Road Police Station arrived at the scene, and the navigation time takes about 7 minutes)
In an interview with the Central Radio and Television Station, Chen Zhiwei lied that he arrived at the scene at 2:46, but actually arrived at the scene at 3:09. Now he revealed in his report that he was blamed and was forced to read out the press release that did not match the actual police time.
According to the work group chat records released by Chen Zhiwei, "Screenshot 2" shows that the police station received the notice at 2:45, and at 2:53 they were still discussing who would go out to the police. "By the way, call Chen Zhiwei. Chen Zhiwei claimed that he "received the police notice at nearly 3 a.m."
And the police called the police at 2:41, and the police called the police at 2:53...
fullContent:
梳理：
 据官方通报和官媒报道；
 2:40分，陈某志伙同他人在餐厅对女子王某和其同伴进行骚扰殴打
 2:41分，群众报警
 2:55分，4名被害人由120送医
 3:09分，民辅警到达现场（地图显示：机场路派出所到达现场，导航时间需7分钟左右）
 陈志伟在接受总台采访时，曾谎称2:46分就到达现场，实际是3:09分到达现场。如今他在举报中透露，自己是背了黑锅，当时被迫念出了实际出警时间不符的新闻稿。
 据陈志伟公布的工作群聊记录，“截图二”说明，派出所民警2:45分接到通知，2:53分还在群内讨论谁出警，“顺道喊一下陈志伟，陈志伟自称“近凌晨3点接到出警通知”
 而2:41分报警，2:53警察仍在群内讨论由谁出警的问题，解释了610案件当晚7分钟的距离，为何出警用了28分钟的原因。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
News on August 5: The State Council: Stimulate consumption vitality in education and training.
Netizens responded, "It's really a hassle to cut it down and then put it back up again."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of the time of writing, all the reports posted by Chen Zhiwei on Douyin and Weibo have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, in Ankang, Shaanxi, a fire broke out in Building 52 of Jushang Community. The local emergency department responded: In order to control public opinion, no information will be disclosed to the outside world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5, Beijing. A man reported Nie Youyi, deputy secretary of the Beijing Ming Tombs Special District Sub-district Office, for illegally tiling the Great Wall within the Juyongguan Cultural Relics Protection Area. "Each tile costs 100 yuan, but is labeled "patriotic public welfare, national project, etc.", and the fee is as high as 80,000 to 800,000 yuan." Netizens responded, "I always thought tiling the Great Wall and installing elevators on Mount Everest were jokes, but I didn't expect it to be true."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 6, Feicheng City, Shandong Province announced that it would give 20 yuan per month to people over 80 years old, 60 yuan per month to people over 90 years old, and 370 yuan per month to people over 100 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, Zhao Lijian's wife posted on Weibo that she had stage 5 breast cancer. On August 6, she posted again that she decided not to accept Western medical treatment, so that she could feel more comfortable in her last days and choose Chinese medicine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of August 6, someone committed suicide by jumping off a building at the Taikang Financial Building in Beijing CBD, smashing through the first floor ceiling. The gender, age and workplace of the deceased are currently unknown, and it is rumored that the reason for the death was layoffs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Huang Yusheng is banned from speaking

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sima Nan wrote on August 4: Strictly speaking, all well-educated Chinese people are "pro-Western" in their bones. This mass base is too large. For Iran, Russia and China, it is not enough to simply oppose the West from a geopolitical perspective. They must abolish Western civilization and political lines from the root and cleanse the genes of worshipping the West from the national body.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hong Kong's Secretary for the Civil Service, Ms. Betty Yeung, said that civil servants cannot criticize any government policies in their capacity as civil servants, and should avoid misunderstandings when expressing their personal opinions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, a netizen revealed that he had contracted the Harbin-Jiamusi railway project, cut corners during construction, and falsified acceptance and test data. According to reports, the netizen told reporters that he signed a contract with China Construction Railway Construction Co., Ltd. in December 2015. In the construction of the 4-kilometer roadbed project of the line, the steel bars of 53 culvert covers were secretly reduced by half compared to the original design.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Since July 2023, the Triangle Park area of Lirendong, Panyu District, Guangzhou City, has suddenly carried out large-scale violent house demolitions without a public construction permit. The violent construction hollowed out the first floor, causing the entire 6- to 8-story building to collapse instantly, causing many surrounding unsigned buildings to tilt and crack. The villagers called the police and complained to the relevant departments many times, asking the other party to take safety measures to avoid further damage to the villagers' houses, but to no avail. Violent and barbaric construction and demolition are still being carried out every day, causing the villagers' houses to be unbearable, severely broken and tilted. The lives and property of the villagers are seriously threatened, and they feel panic all day long living in the house. The villagers complained and negotiated with each other to no avail, and even the Lirendong Village Committee shirked responsibility and distorted the facts. During the theoretical discussion, some villagers fainted, but due to the unlicensed enclosure construction, the ambulance could not enter normally for rescue, and some villagers were knocked to the ground.
On the morning of August 6, 2024...
fullContent:
网友投稿
自2023年7月以来，广州市番禺区里仁洞三角园片区在无公示施工许可证的情况下，突然进行大规模暴力房屋拆除。暴力施工挖空首层致使整幢6到8层的建筑瞬间倒塌，造成周边多幢未签约的楼房倾斜、震裂。村民多次报警及向有关部门投诉，要求对方做好安全措施，避免继续损坏村民的房屋，但毫无结果。  每天仍在进行暴力野蛮施工拆除，导致村民的房屋已不堪承受，严重震断裂及倾斜。村民的生命和财产受到严重威胁，住在屋内感到慌恐不可终日。村民多方投诉协商无果，甚至里仁洞村委推诿责任，歪曲事实。  在商谈理论的过程中，有村民昏倒，但由于无证围蔽施工，救护车无法正常进入施救，更有村民被打倒地。
2024年8月6号早上，村干部来看村民的房子，村民叫他进房子看，他却说不用看，并称是自然裂缝。村民房子被震裂，却被如此轻视，无法接受。
吵架过程中，村民气晕，救护车又进不来，四周都被封闭，村民的生命安全完全得不到保障。希望有关部门能介入调查处理，还村民一个正常的居住生活家园。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on August 2, the State Council recently issued a plan to promote the transfer of agricultural population with stable employment and living in cities to settle in cities. Experts: Farmers moving their families to cities may become the main force driving the real estate market.
Netizens replied "Good things don't think of me, but when something happens, I think of me"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5 (Released) Ma Jun, the speaker of Sun Tzu's Art of War on Lecture Room 100, said: China's overall backwardness is related to the fact that China does not offer logic courses. "If you don't offer logic courses, you won't be able to think, and you won't be able to reason." To this, a netizen replied, "What if you offer logic courses and know the truth?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, lawyer Li from Beijing revealed that a woman gathered many people to make a scene and stay at the Fourth Circuit Court of the Supreme People's Court, the Higher People's Court of Henan Province, and the Guancheng Hui District People's Court of Zhengzhou in April this year. She was fined 50,000 yuan and detained for 15 days by the Guancheng Hui District Court of Zhengzhou. Lawyer Li said that the Zhengzhou Development Zone Court was scolded for three hours and was only fined 10,000 yuan. It seems that the Development Zone Court is much more "open-minded" than Guancheng District.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 6, Hebei. Netizens responded to Bai Yansong's statement that "ordinary people have money but dare not spend it". He said that his parents-in-law have a net income of only about 5,000 yuan a year. They are not allowed to burn firewood in winter, and using gas costs 2,500 yuan a year. "How do they live with the remaining 2,500 yuan? A patient can't poop, you squeeze the suppository every day, and complain that the suppository is not working. You should care more about him because he has no food to eat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 6, in Yongcheng, Henan, a knife attack occurred at Yongcheng Bus Station. The video showed a man stabbing another man with a knife, and the man's clothes were covered with blood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 6 (Released) A mudslide disaster occurred in Ridi Village, Kangding, Sichuan. Rescuers dug through thorns and rocks with their bare hands to rescue a buried resident. According to reports, as of 9:00 on the 5th, the disaster caused 9 deaths and 18 people were missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 6, Chengdu, Sichuan. A netizen posted that her father's eye surgery cost 11,000 yuan, but after reimbursement, she only had to pay 355 yuan. She lamented, "Is the reimbursement rate for medical treatment within the system so high?" In response, some netizens advised the author to delete the post quickly.
